title: Last Will and Testimeow: Weekend at Dead Cat Lady’s House II
featuredTitle: Last Will and Testimeow: Weekend at Dead Cat Lady’s House II
description: Mrs. Sullivan always planned to leave everything to her cats. But sometimes, plans need a helping paw.
quote: There’s something about you, Mrs. Sullivan.
altHero: a man with an ice cream cone admires the woman he’s with who is clearly a decaying corpse surrounded by flies and semi-exposed cats’ tails
alt1: two cats find their owner, Mrs. Sullivan, dead on the floor
alt2: a group of cats carry Mrs. Sullivan’s corpse down the sidewalk
alt3: the man gazes at Mrs. Sullivan while cats prop up her head from behind
alt4: cats prop up Mrs. Sullivan’s head and arms as flies buzz around her
